pages.text: The Capacity Upgrade enhances your Filing Index's capabilities, allowing it to connect to more cabinets over a larger area.

pages.title: Benefits
pages.text: Installing a Capacity Upgrade in your Filing Index provides:$(br)$(br)$(li)Increased radius from 8 to 16 blocks$(li)Increased cabinet limit from 64 to 128 cabinets

pages.title: Installation
pages.text: To install the upgrade:$(br)$(br)1. Craft the Capacity Upgrade$(br)2. Right-click on a Filing Index with the upgrade$(br)3. The upgrade will be installed, immediately increasing the range and capacity$(br)$(br)You can also access the upgrade slot through the Filing Index GUI.
